machine_end_gcode.default_value:
G28 X0 Y0
M104 S0 T1 ; turn off extruder
M104 S0 T0
M140 S0 ; turn off bed
G28 X0
M106 P0 S0
M106 P1 S0
M84 S0
M84 XYE; disable motors except Z

machine_start_gcode.default_value:
M605 S1 ; Set dual carriage mode S0 slicer full control | S1 AutoPark inactive head | S2 duplicate
T0
M106 P0 S[fan_speed_pwm]
M106 P1 S[fan_speed_pwm]
G28 ; home all axes
M420 S1 ; Enable bed leveling compensation using current grid/mesh
G1 X-42 F8000
G92 E0
G1 E5 F500
G1 X0 F5000
G1 X-40
G1 X0
G1 X-40
G1 X0
G1 X-40
G1 X200
G1 Y200 F5000
T1
G1 X440 F8000 ; park T0 head at X=440
G92 E0 ; Zero extruder count
